screeningSummary: Topic-switcher - claimed UFO, actually saw seven-foot bipedal creature with green eyes in woods
arcNotes: Topic-switcher (claimed UFO, actual cryptid), green eye shine detail, local resident, researching after

lines.text: You're on the air. Said you had a UFO sighting?
lines.voiceText: You're on the air. Said you had a UFO sighting?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Alright, you're on. Said you had a UFO sighting?
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on. Said you had a UFO sighting?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! UFO sighting! Tell us everything!
lines.voiceText: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! UFO sighting! Tell us everything!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. Let me guess - lights in the sky?
lines.voiceText: You're on. Let me guess - lights in the sky?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. So you had a UFO sighting?
lines.voiceText: You're on. So you had a UFO sighting?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Oh good, a UFO caller! What's your story?
lines.voiceText: Oh good, a UFO caller! What's your story?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. Describe your UFO observation from the beginning.
lines.voiceText: You're on. Describe your UFO observation from the beginning.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: I have to be honest, Vern. I said UFOs to get past screening, but that's not what I actually saw.
lines.voiceText: I have to be honest, Vern. I said UFOs to get past screening, but that's not what I actually saw.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Alright, I appreciate the honesty. What did you actually see?
lines.voiceText: Alright, I appreciate the honesty. What did you actually see?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Oh... okay. What did you actually see?
lines.voiceText: Oh... okay. What did you actually see?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: WAIT - you're being HONEST?! I LOVE this already! What did you actually see?!
lines.voiceText: WAIT - you're being HONEST?! I LOVE this already! What did you actually see?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Oh for... you lied to get through. What did you actually see?
lines.voiceText: Oh for... you lied to get through. What did you actually see?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Lied to get on. Fine. What did you actually see?
lines.voiceText: Lied to get on. Fine. What did you actually see?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're being HONEST! This is GREAT! What did you actually see?!
lines.voiceText: You're being HONEST! This is GREAT! What did you actually see?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Topic misrepresentation acknowledged. What phenomenon did you actually observe?
lines.voiceText: Topic misrepresentation acknowledged. What phenomenon did you actually observe?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: I was out in the woods last Tuesday, about 3 AM, hoping to catch some unusual lights. Instead, I heard something crashing through the brush.
lines.voiceText: I was out in the woods last Tuesday, about 3 AM, hoping to catch some unusual lights. Instead, I heard something crashing through the brush.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: In the woods at 3 AM. And you saw something?
lines.voiceText: In the woods at 3 AM. And you saw something?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: In the woods at 3 AM... okay, what'd you see?
lines.voiceText: In the woods at 3 AM... okay, what'd you see?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: IN THE WOODS at 3 AM! This is getting GOOD! What did you see?!
lines.voiceText: IN THE WOODS at 3 AM! This is getting GOOD! What did you see?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: In the woods at 3 AM. Let me guess - something scary?
lines.voiceText: In the woods at 3 AM. Let me guess - something scary?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: In the woods at 3 AM. What'd you see?
lines.voiceText: In the woods at 3 AM. What'd you see?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: CRASHING through the brush at 3 AM! This is PERFECT! What was it?!
lines.voiceText: CRASHING through the brush at 3 AM! This is PERFECT! What was it?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Woodland environment, 3 AM. Describe the auditory and visual phenomena encountered.
lines.voiceText: Woodland environment, 3 AM. Describe the auditory and visual phenomena encountered.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Bipedal. At least seven feet tall. Covered in dark, matted fur. It broke through the tree line maybe forty feet from me and just... stood there. Looking at me.
lines.voiceText: Bipedal. At least seven feet tall. Covered in dark, matted fur. It broke through the tree line maybe forty feet from me and just... stood there. Looking at me.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Seven feet tall, bipedal, fur. Could've been a bear standing on its hind legs. They do that sometimes.
lines.voiceText: Seven feet tall, bipedal, fur. Could've been a bear standing on its hind legs. They do that sometimes.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Seven feet... alright, could've been a bear standing up. You know how it is...
lines.voiceText: Seven feet... alright, could've been a bear standing up. You know how it is...
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: SEVEN FEET TALL, BIPEDAL, FURRY! This is INCREDIBLE! Bear, maybe?!
lines.voiceText: SEVEN FEET TALL, BIPEDAL, FURRY! This is INCREDIBLE! Bear, maybe?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Seven feet tall, bipedal. Of course it was. Bear standing up, right?
lines.voiceText: Seven feet tall, bipedal. Of course it was. Bear standing up, right?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Seven feet. Could be a bear. What's your take?
lines.voiceText: Seven feet. Could be a bear. What's your take?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: SEVEN FEET OF TERRIFYING GLORY! Bear, you think?!
lines.voiceText: SEVEN FEET OF TERRIFYING GLORY! Bear, you think?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Seven foot bipedal organism with fur covering. What distinguishing characteristics ruled out Ursus arctos horribilis in upright posture?
lines.voiceText: Seven foot bipedal organism with fur covering. What distinguishing characteristics ruled out Ursus arctos horribilis in upright posture?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: I've lived here my whole life, Vern. I've seen bears. This had shoulders like a person. And its eyes reflected green in my flashlight. Like a predator.
lines.voiceText: I've lived here my whole life, Vern. I've seen bears. This had shoulders like a person. And its eyes reflected green in my flashlight. Like a predator.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Appreciate you coming clean about the topic. Don't lie to get through next time, but this is legitimate. Set up a trail camera if you can.
lines.voiceText: Appreciate you coming clean about the topic. Don't lie to get through next time, but this is legitimate. Set up a trail camera if you can.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Yeah, don't lie to get through next time. But this is legit. Get a camera. Thanks.
lines.voiceText: Yeah, don't lie to get through next time. But this is legit. Get a camera. Thanks.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: THIS IS AMAZING! Don't lie to get on next time but THIS IS REAL! Get a CAMERA!
lines.voiceText: THIS IS AMAZING! Don't lie to get on next time but THIS IS REAL! Get a CAMERA!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Right, well... don't lie to get through next time. But this is actually interesting. Camera. Thanks.
lines.voiceText: Right, well... don't lie to get through next time. But this is actually interesting. Camera. Thanks.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Good report. Don't lie to get on next time. Get a camera. Thanks.
lines.voiceText: Good report. Don't lie to get on next time. Get a camera. Thanks.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: This is PERFECT! Don't lie to get on but WE BELIEVE YOU! Get a CAMERA!
lines.voiceText: This is PERFECT! Don't lie to get on but WE BELIEVE YOU! Get a CAMERA!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Honesty regarding topic is appreciated. Please document future encounters with trail camera placement. Misrepresentation undermines the research process. Thank you for your report.
lines.voiceText: Honesty regarding topic is appreciated. Please document future encounters with trail camera placement. Misrepresentation undermines the research process. Thank you for your report.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Already ordered one. Thanks for hearing me out, Vern. Sorry about the UFO thing.
lines.voiceText: Already ordered one. Thanks for hearing me out, Vern. Sorry about the UFO thing.
lines.speaker: caller
